description: Application for a Minor Material Amendment (S73.a) to vary condition 2 (approved drawings and documents) of planning permission ref: 202093FUL dated 02/12/2021 for: Construction of a part three storey, part four storey, building to accommodate 9 self-contained flats and provision of associated communal amenity space and cycle parking (following demolition of existing houses). Amendment seeks modifications of flats 8 and 9 (third floor) layout with the same layout as flats 6 and 7 (second floor)
decision_conditions: The proposed extension at third floor level would result in a form of development that would be out of keeping with the streetscene. The proposed amendment would therefore be contrary to policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policy 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). It is considered that the proposal does not fall within the provisions of s73 of the Town and Country Planning Act or the Council's Protocol for Minor Material Amendments.
